title: I need Ruby-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>*Shocked*....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Eh? Eh? What happened, Kasumi-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Ruby-chan and Kasumin aren’t that different in height huh…. Kasumin thought that Ruby-chan is way smaller<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Eeeh~! T-, that’s mean! Ruby’s sister is also big, so Ruby will grow bigger too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Well~, to grow to Dia-senpai’s level in two years is going to be pretty hard~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Pigii! I-, it’s not hard! Ruby is angry! Angry okay! Ruby is not going to help with the last part of Kasumi-chan’s outfit!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eeh---!? No way no way! Sorry~! Kasumin needs Ruby-chan’s fashion sense---!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ruby’s fashion sense….? Ruby doesn’t have that. The one that has it is You-chan, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Certainly, You-senpai is amazing. But, for Kasumin’s cuteness, it has to be Ruby-chan’s fashion sense! Please please, Pl-e-a-se~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>You need Ruby’s fashion sense…. You say? I-, is that so, ehehe…. Then, Ruby will help after all<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Ruby-chan…. It might be strange coming from Kasumin, but you shouldn’t forgive people that easily, you know….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Eeeh! Then how do you want Ruby to react, Kasumi-chan--!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
